title: The Writer's Almanac - Sunday, September 8, 2019
description: It was on this day in 1920 that the first transcontinental U.S. airmail service began, from New York to San Francisco.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It was on this day in 1920 that the first transcontinental U.S. airmail service began, from New York to San Francisco.
